description:
The four have plans to go to the beach, but unfortunately, it`s pouring rain on that day. Though nervous about wearing a bikini, Hana was looking forward to going so much that she weeps uncontrollably, heartbroken that their excursion is canceled. To cheer themselves up, the girls decide to have fun hanging out in their bikinis at Temari Heights. The atmosphere becomes even more festive when Hiroe and Shion join in.
Source: crunchyroll
